channel.title: anxiety on mental excess.
channel.description: Recent content in anxiety on mental excess.

item.title: The Right Tools.
item.description: It can be difficult to identify whether anxiety can simply be overcome through thought or a shift in thinking. Given that it’s literally in the mind, what is the difference between a healthy mind and one that overthinks? Mental disorders in general are fuzzy, and somewhat undefined as they manifest differently in everyone. This can make me somewhat skeptical of our understanding of psychology because it seems so undefined, and we don’t know and can’t observe those interactions.
